devo_ml.modelmanager.auth

AuthCallable

Signature type for callable authentications.

alias of Callable[[PreparedRequest], PreparedRequest]

BEARER = 'bearer'

Constant denoting authentication type Bearer.

STANDALONE = 'standalone'

Constant denoting authentication type StandAlone.

get_default_auth_type() → str[source]

Returns the default authentication type used.

Returns

The default authentication

Return type

str

validate_auth_type(auth_type: str) → bool[source]

Checks whether a value is a valid authentication type.

Parameters

auth_type (str) – The value to validate

Returns

True if the value is a valid authentication type otherwise False

Return type

bool

create_auth_from_token(token: str, auth_type: str = 'standalone') → Callable[[PreparedRequest], PreparedRequest][source]

Creates an authentication object based on a token ready to use by the client.

Parameters

  • token (str) – The token to authenticate

  • auth_type (str) – The type of the authentication, defaults to STANDALONE

Raises

ValueError – if auth_type is not valid

Returns

An authentication object

Return type

AuthCallable

class HttpDevoTokenAuth(token: str)[source]

An HTTP authentication scheme based on a token supported by ML Model Manager.

The implementations of this class are objects ready to use by the client to authenticate and also by requests library.

__init__(token: str) → None[source]

Creates an authentication base on a token.

Parameters

token (str) – The token used

abstract __call__(req: PreparedRequest) → PreparedRequest[source]

Subclasses must implement this method to client be able to call it as a function when authenticate a request.

Parameters

req (requests.PreparedRequest) – The request object to authenticate

Returns

The request object authenticated

Return type

requests.PreparedRequest

class HttpDevoStandAloneTokenAuth(token: str)[source]

An HttpDevoTokenAuth that authenticates a request with HTTP Devo Standalone authentication scheme.

__call__(req: PreparedRequest) → PreparedRequest[source]

Adds the header standAloneToken: <token> to the request.

Parameters

req (requests.PreparedRequest) – The request object to authenticate

Returns

The request object authenticated with proper header

Return type

requests.PreparedRequest

class HttpDevoBearerTokenAuth(token: str)[source]

An HttpDevoTokenAuth that authenticates a request with HTTP Bearer authentication scheme.

__call__(req: PreparedRequest) → PreparedRequest[source]

Adds the header Authorization: Bearer <token> to the request.

Parameters

req (requests.PreparedRequest) – The request object to authenticate

Returns

The request object authenticated with proper header

Return type

requests.PreparedRequest
